summary: Provides dataset utilities for text‑normalization tagging tasks, defining a data instance that holds written and spoken token sequences with associated metadata and a NeMo Dataset implementation that reads raw tagger files, tokenizes them (including Moses and transformer tokenizers), and yields processed examples for model training or evaluation.
business_intent: Enable developers to train and evaluate text‑normalization tagger models that convert written text into its spoken form, supporting multilingual and direction‑aware preprocessing within speech‑AI pipelines.
